title: "Intel axes Nvidia-powered NUC X15 laptops for Arc GPU reseller push"
excerpt: "Intel is discontinuing its line of NUC X15 laptop kits with Nvidia GeForce RTX 30 series GPUs. Resellers will instead be offered laptop kits with Intel's Arc graphics chip family. The semiconductor giant recently issued a discontinuation notice [ PDF] for the gaming-focused 2021 laptop kits,"
